display_long_description:
Welcome to Neolithic Dawn - the ultimate survival experience! 
Step into the shoes of a Stone Age Hunter-Gatherer and struggle to survive in the harsh wilderness of 10,000 BC.                                               


[media]
**🐺 Tame Anything**

Any animal you encounter can become a powerful ally - choose your battles by feeding animals to tame them instead!

**👯‍♂️ Up to 4 Player CO-OP**

Even more fun when you bring your tribe and face the wilderness together, with up to 4 players in private CO-OP games with friends.


[media]
**🪓 Physics-Based Crafting**

Craft whatever you can out of what you find. Find new combinations of tools and weapons when you combine sticks, rocks, and bones with your own two hands in true caveman fashion.

[media]

**💀Generational Permadeath**

Death is a new beginning - return as the next member of your lineage to a version of the world that has been permanently altered by time.  

**🌎 Living World**

Experience a real-time day night cycle, dynamic seasons, and generational changes as you explore 5 large open world maps each with its own unique dungeon and campsites to explore and build.

We thank you for your support of this project, and are excited to end Early Access and start a new chapter where we will continue to update and expand the world of Neolithic Dawn in version 1.0!

**🐺 Tame Anything**

**👯‍♂️ Up to 4 Player CO-OP**

Even more fun when you bring your tribe and face the wilderness together, with up to 4 players in private CO-OP games with friends.


![{"height":360,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/499618013_1495206271767752_9005840675412099078_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=7L045sbNTD4Q7kNvwEGXREQ&_nc_oc=AdkEeu-j272nWAAqZwHRhPzTS__7cEAwyk4eCUS-hLv4H3jKYemLzW5DvfCDD6frE1w&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=WD-lRXWJco9r7jvJlvwXuQ&oh=00_AfphtQWREX72Gtj-HZR4u8EKEKGRsUs276pc7OgVkthJJw&oe=695C5184)
**🪓 Physics-Based Crafting**

Craft whatever you can out of what you find. Find new combinations of tools and weapons when you combine sticks, rocks, and bones with your own two hands in true caveman fashion.

**💀Generational Permadeath**

Death is a new beginning - return as the next member of your lineage to a version of the world that has been permanently altered by time.  

**🌎 Living World**

Experience a real-time day night cycle, dynamic seasons, and generational changes as you explore 5 large open world maps each with its own unique dungeon and campsites to explore and build.

We thank you for your support of this project, and are excited to end Early Access and start a new chapter where we will continue to update and expand the world of Neolithic Dawn in version 1.0!
